name: TG Product Quantity Plus Minus Button
author: Technify Guru

sections.description:
Product quantity updater plugin will add quantity increment and decrement buttons with the product quantity input control. Users will be able to change product quantity on product details and cart pages. The plugin works with all product types with quantity control. Once the plugin is active it will add an increment and decrement button on both sides of the product quantity input control. The plugin will add these buttons on product details page and cart page.

Features

  • Change button styling according to your theme (New)
  • Add quantity updater buttons to increase or decrease product quantity
  • Feature available on product details and cart pages
  • On cart page, quantity updater will hide Update Cart button and automatically update the cart on quantity change
  • Supports all types of products
  • Very light weight
  • Only a few lines of CSS included, which will not effect your website speed and optimization score
  • Just a few lines of JS, which is not render blocking.

Dependencies

  1. WordPress v3.0.1 and later
  2. Woocommerce v2.6 and later
  3. PHP v7.4 and later
sections.installation:
1. Upload and extract tgqb.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the settings at the administration menu >> Settings >> Wooconmerce Product Quantity Updater
sections.faq:
Will this plugin work with variable product type?

Yes, it works perfectly with all product types

Can I enable it on only the pages where I need it?

Yes, this is provided in the plugin’s setting section where you can enale and disable it on selected pages

  • Added styling feature for the buttons

  • Improved user experience.

1.0.2

  • Fixed website button issue.
  • Fixed increment buttons not working issue.

  • Fixed a bug in admin setting tab.
  • Fixed admin url issue.

1.0.0

  • This version fixes a security related bug. Upgrade immediately.
